column3: Faculty of Engineering and Physical Sciences
column5: Enhance your understanding of computers with a master's in computer science at the University of Southampton.This flexible programme allows you to choose modules from our masterâ€™s degrees in:Artificial Intelligence (AI)Cyber SecurityData ScienceSoftware EngineeringWeb Science and TechnologyBy the end of your studies, you will have developed a set of specialised skills in several computer science disciplines. Many of our graduates become software developers, but you could also apply your talents as a consultant, project manager or technical specialist.
